articles.title: Bond yields rise tracking US yields; rupee gains
articles.description: Bond yields edged higher on Thursday, reversing almost all of its recent fall, following an uptick in US treasury yields ahead of the Federal Reserve's meeting next week, while the rupee rose in line with a return of risk appetite globally.
